app.title: Digital Maturity Assessment
app.subtitle: Digital maturity assessment for SMEs
app.description: A tool to assess and improve the digital maturity of small and medium-sized enterprises based on the EU/JRC framework.

assessment.title: Digital Maturity Assessment
assessment.subtitle: Answer the questions below to assess your business digital maturity
assessment.description: Assess your business digital maturity based on the EU/JRC framework
assessment.completionMessage: Congratulations! You have completed the assessment.
assessment.incompleteMessage: Please answer all required questions before continuing.

Q1.title: Has your business defined a clear digital strategy?
Q1.desc: A digital strategy describes how technology should be used to achieve business objectives.

Q2.title: To what extent is the digital strategy integrated with the overall business strategy?
Q2.desc: Assess how well the digital strategy is coordinated with the company's main goals and processes.

Q3.title: Which areas does your business digital readiness encompass?
Q3.desc: Digital readiness includes technical, organizational, and human resources for digital transformation.

Q4.title: Does your business have a plan for digital competence development?
Q4.desc: Systematic development of digital skills among employees.

Q5.title: Human-centric digitalization in the business:
Q5.desc: How are employees and customers involved in the digitalization process?
Q5.left: Employees are actively involved in designing digital solutions
Q5.right: Customer needs and feedback drive digital development

Q6.title: To what extent are digital tools used to improve customer experience?
Q6.desc: Assess the use of digital solutions for customer interaction and service.

Q7.title: Which data management practices has the business implemented?
Q7.desc: Systematic handling and analysis of business data.

Q8.title: Does the business have access to high-speed internet connection?
Q8.desc: Reliable and fast internet connection is fundamental for digital operations.

Q9.title: To what extent does the business use automation in its processes?
Q9.desc: Automation of routine tasks and business processes.

Q10.title: Which AI technologies does the business consider or use?
Q10.desc: Artificial intelligence and machine learning for business improvement.

Q11.title: Has the business implemented environmentally friendly digital practices?
Q11.desc: Use of digital solutions to reduce environmental impact and support sustainability.
